value.name: Niña Amada Mía
value.overview: Niña... Amada Mia is a telenovela that premiered in 2003. It is a production of Angelli Nesma and the protagonists are Sergio Goyri and Karyme Lozano. Premiered in other countries, like in Greece in 2004 with the title 'Νίνα'. by repeating the 2005 and 2006.
